div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1112 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1957 Burial: late 3rd-early 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 8 AR, 15 AE Olbia: 5 didr. (as NC 1937, pp. 95-96, nos. 12 [3], 17 [1] AMNG I.1, pl. 10, 21 [1]) 3 dr. (as AMNG I.1, pl. 10, 23) 15 AE (as AMNG I.1 pl. 9, 28-29 [4], 30 [4]; pl. 10, 13 [2], 20 [1]; unc. [4]) Disposition: Kiev Karyszkowski, NE 2 (1960), pp. 14-27
